--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1VBVO8_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-29 17:38
Subject: RE: Credit insurance 
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Vince,

 

Hope all is well.

 

We don’t have credit insurance currently.

 

Are you facing any issues with third party companies for non-payments or delayed payments in excess of 365 days?

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

From: Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, July 29, 2025 2:50 PM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Credit insurance 

 

Hi Hagop – hope all is well. 

 

Do you know if the company has credit insurance?

I have heard that other companies like LV have credit insurance with companies like Coface. 

Thanks

 

Vince

VINCE MULÉ

VP ‑ ACCOUNTING

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

ID: C1VBVO8_01
From: Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-31 22:27
Subject: RE: Credit insurance 
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Hagop – indeed we do have overdue receivables > 365 days and also legal cases that Nada and her team are working on as we cannot collect the cash. 

 

I was interviewing someone for the credit control manager position, and he works at LV Beauty. They apparently have credit insurance….so that is why I was curious to see if we also had it at Chalhoub. 

 

Thanks 

 

VINCE MULÉ	
VP ‑ ACCOUNTING
